title: INTERNATIONAL HR INTERNSHIP (UK)
description:
INTERNATIONAL HR INTERNSHIP (UK)
(12 weeks minimum)

*We are*
· An expanding company located in St. Helens, between Liverpool and Manchester.
· Specialised in bar code labelling equipment and services.
· Constantly looking for committed students for our internships.
· An international company with our main office in England and excellent links to EU countries.

*We offer*
· Some of the best known and well established internships in Europe.
· The opportunity to work in a dynamic team with people from all over Europe.
· The possibility to take real responsibility and to gain real professional experience.
· The chance to significantly improve your English skills by living and working in a British business environment.

*Your tasks will be*
· Maintaining the full recruitment process
· Reviewing the new applications and selecting suitable candidates
· Organising new interns’ and employees’ arrivals
· Creating and publish job and internship advertisements
· Developing the database
· Interviewing potential employees and interns by phone or face to face
· Organising and go through the monthly company meeting again
· general office administration

*You should*
· have good English skills.
· Ideally be fluent in Spanish, German, Italian, French or any other European language.
· Be serious, ambitious and self-motivated.
· Be flexible and able to manage several tasks at the same time.
